ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent users from changing their Quality Assurance Agent User (who can perform case quality assessments). Allow only Primary Manager or admin to make this change.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( AND ( ISCHANGED( CQI_Coach_User__c ) , ManagerId <> $User.Id, NOT ( CONTAINS ( $Profile.Name , 'Admin') ) ), CQI_Coach_User__c == Id
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Primary Manager can update the QAA User information & must not be same user.
